oai_dc:dc.dc:title: U-Compare Paragraph-Breaking Service
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Web service created by exporting UIMA-based workflow from the U-Compare text mining system. Functionality: Identifies paragraphs in plain text Tools in workflow: MLRS Paragraph Splitter (University of Malta) NOTE: The licence provided covers the web service only. Tools used to create the workflow may have their own licences
